pages.text:
Title: Zone center wavenumbers of tetragonal CdAl2S4 and CdAl2Se4

Abstract: A short-range force constant model was applied to investigate the phonons in CdAl2X4 (X = S, Se) defect chalcopyrite compounds in their tetragonal phase. The calculation with six stretching and one bending force constants provides good agreement for the observed Raman and infrared wavenumbers. The Al—X interatomic force constants of its bonds were found to be stronger than the Cd—X interatomic force constants. The three dominant force constants have a constant ratio when S is replaced by Se. Copyright © 2000 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
